name: FLOG (petet)
description:
UPDATE: more levels added!  I didn't get around to implementing all of the mechanics that I wanted to include in the game, but I more or less achieved the aesthetic that I was aiming for.

this is my very last-minute entry for PIGSquad's August 2022 Summer Slow Jams.

it's still very much a work in progress!  i plan to add more levels (and begin to address the game jam's theme) in the coming week.

CONTROLS: arrow keys to move, [x] to swing.  gamepads are also supported!
